animeDescription: Barbapapa and his family can turn into anything they want. Each member of the family has his or her own personality. Very good show for the youngest children as each episode deals with another problem they will recognize in a way that is 'morally correct'.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Yamada Katsuhisa', ['Episode Director']], ['Yuyama Kunihiko', ['Storyboard']], ['Schubert Franz Peter', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Pierpont James Lord', ['Theme Song Composition']]]
